name: Love Love
description:
Classic arcade gameplay, fresh psychedelic graphics. 

Face off against AI in this experimental pong-like featuring:

  • Gameplay  elements that change dynamically as you play
  • game-breaking abilities
  • unique low res graphics based on cellular automata
  • original music synchronized with the game speed and art
  • full controller support
  • tennis like scoring system

Download for free and only pay if you like it.

Controls:

  • keyboard:
    • Serve / menu confirm: (SPACE)
    • move left/right: (LEFT/RIGHT) or  (A/D)
    • spin ball clockwise/counter-clockwise (E/Q)
    • reverse ball: (R)
    • boost ball: (SHIFT)
    • toggle slow mode (B)
    • quit to menu (ESC)
  • gamepad:
    • Serve / menu confirm: (A)
    • move left/right: (LEFT/RIGHT)
    • spin ball clockwise/counter-clockwise (R/L)
    • reverse ball: (Y)
    • boost ball: (X)
    • toggle slow mode (B)
    • quit to menu (SELECT/BACK)
dev note:

the 5th game released as part of an effort to release roughly 2 games a month in 2023.
